channel.title: Highscores
channel.description: anyone have a tut on how to make a highscores page on your forums or just make a sept website for the highscores for your server?

Read full topic

item.title: Highscores
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

[code]

Statistics:

Please choose skill:
<?php $dirplayer = "D:\sSs\ots\ots\data\players/"; // players $showskill = ""; if(isset($_GET['skill'])) { $showskill = $_GET['skill']; } if($showskill == "") $showskill = "level"; $searched = ""; switch($showskill) { case "level": $searched = "level=\""; break; case "exp": $searched = "exp=\""; break; case "magic": $searched = "maglevel=\""; break; case "club": $searched = "<skill skillid=\"1\" level=\""; break; case "sword": $searched = "<skill skillid=\"2\" level=\""; break; case "axe": $searched = "<skill skillid=\"3\" level=\""; break; case "distance": $searched = "<skill skillid=\"4\" level=\""; break; case "shield": $searched = "read()) { if(eregi(".xml$",$plik)) { $file = file($players."/".$plik); $plik = explode(".",$plik); } for($i2 = 0; $file["$i2"]; $i2++) { $result = strstr($file[$i2], $searched); if($result) { $resultarray = explode("\"",$result); if($showskill == "level" || $showskill == "exp" || $showskill == "magic") { if($x[$i] = $resultarray[1]."---".$plik[0]) break; } else if ($showskill == "club" || $showskill == "sword" || $showskill == "axe" || $showskill == "distance" || $showskill == "shield") { if($x[$i] = $resultarray[3]."---".$plik[0]) break; } } } $i++; } if($showskill == "level" || $showskill == "exp" || $showskill == "magic" || $showskill == "club" || $showskill == "sword" || $showskill == "axe" || $showskill == "distance" || $showskill == "shield") { echo "
"; echo " Level
"; echo "Experience
";; echo "Magic Level
";; echo "Club Fighting
"; echo "Sword Fighting
"; echo "Axe Fighting
"; echo "Distance Fighting
"; echo "Shielding
"; SORT($x, 1); echo "		 Highscores
"; $i2 = 1; while($i >= 0 && $i2 <= 25) { $result = explode("---", "$x[$i]"); if($result[0] != "" && $result[1] != "" && $result[1] != "Gamemaster" && $result[1] != "G" && $result[1] != "Y") { echo "\n"; $i2++; } $i--; } echo "
" . $i2 . ".
" .$result['1']. "
" .$result['0']. "
"; } echo "
"; ?> [/code] Use code tags next time. and I could look into something for you, try and find one.

Read full topic

item.title: Highscores
item.dc:creator: @Asante213 Asante213
item.description:
@Asante213 wrote:

[code]

Statistics:

Please choose skill:
<?php $dirplayer = "D:\sSs\ots\ots\data\players/"; // players $showskill = ""; if(isset($_GET['skill'])) { $showskill = $_GET['skill']; } if($showskill == "") $showskill = "level"; $searched = ""; switch($showskill) { case "level": $searched = "level=\""; break; case "exp": $searched = "exp=\""; break; case "magic": $searched = "maglevel=\""; break; case "club": $searched = "<skill skillid=\"1\" level=\""; break; case "sword": $searched = "<skill skillid=\"2\" level=\""; break; case "axe": $searched = "<skill skillid=\"3\" level=\""; break; case "distance": $searched = "<skill skillid=\"4\" level=\""; break; case "shield": $searched = "read()) { if(eregi(".xml$",$plik)) { $file = file($players."/".$plik); $plik = explode(".",$plik); } for($i2 = 0; $file["$i2"]; $i2++) { $result = strstr($file[$i2], $searched); if($result) { $resultarray = explode("\"",$result); if($showskill == "level" || $showskill == "exp" || $showskill == "magic") { if($x[$i] = $resultarray[1]."---".$plik[0]) break; } else if ($showskill == "club" || $showskill == "sword" || $showskill == "axe" || $showskill == "distance" || $showskill == "shield") { if($x[$i] = $resultarray[3]."---".$plik[0]) break; } } } $i++; } if($showskill == "level" || $showskill == "exp" || $showskill == "magic" || $showskill == "club" || $showskill == "sword" || $showskill == "axe" || $showskill == "distance" || $showskill == "shield") { echo "
"; echo " Level
"; echo "Experience
";; echo "Magic Level
";; echo "Club Fighting
"; echo "Sword Fighting
"; echo "Axe Fighting
"; echo "Distance Fighting
"; echo "Shielding
"; SORT($x, 1); echo "		 Highscores
"; $i2 = 1; while($i >= 0 && $i2 <= 25) { $result = explode("---", "$x[$i]"); if($result[0] != "" && $result[1] != "" && $result[1] != "Gamemaster" && $result[1] != "G" && $result[1] != "Y") { echo "\n"; $i2++; } $i--; } echo "
" . $i2 . ".
" .$result['1']. "
" .$result['0']. "
"; } echo "
"; ?>

Idk how to put it in a code so if any1 told [/code] meh highly appreciate it, until then thatz the code above!
